title: Gentleman Yasuo
body:
Okay sorry if this is already an idea but I thought of it just now or remembered it so my thought was 
* Weapon - Cane but like a sword in a cane? so the cane is a sheath
* Clothes - Like reallllllllllllllllllllyyyyyyyyyyyyyyy formal clothes and a monocle and his normal hair and a top hat and the edge of his hair  
* Skill visuals - uh this part is pretty hard so I m asking for your help guys :D
* Recall - okay i have two ideas for this when he starts recalling his giant mansion appears and he walks up the stairs and opens the door and as he walks into the mansion he recalls or as the recall starts he calls for his limousine and as he drives away he arrives in his fountain or a really comfy seat appears and a waiter comes gives him a glass of wine or something and he drinks it <-- loves that one
*  Taunts and dances - Taunts uh I dont really know help! and dances he can have like a piano and he plays that as his ctrl 3\
how he walks - can he walk like his back straight and walking really posh and use his cane to walk? or will that not suit yasuo? just a pass by idea
 Oh and if this idea works can i pleaseeeeeeeeee have it :3 
and thats about it thanks for reading and hopefully this will work :D and tell me if they is more i have to write

replies.body: The point of gentleman skins is to make monstrous characters look funny/classy (gentleman {{champion:31}} /{{champion:150}}  this would be more like mafia or secret agent {{champion:157}} .
I'd rather leave the Gentleman skinline to non-human champions. I want to see one for Vel'Koz or even Urgot.
omg urgot pls.. urgot needs a bikini skin too
ahahahahahah wtf i lost it at the limousine hahaha. If they did this he'd probs have too much of a tf theme

Mafia samurai. Mafia yasuo? he is quite notorious
a sword that looks expensive and carved
top hat tuxedo
he'd have like a blues puny tale
plays a saxaphone instead of his flute in dance
recalls with his head down holding his sword to his head
hios windwall would be a black tiles one, looks so mafia 
hes other attacks would just kind of be the same , possibly even keep his normal wind wall so it wont be legendary
Yeah sorry i don't read things that are in bold.
yeah it strains my eyes to read.. a bit unnecessary

sorry this web was like changing it to bold and this is also my first post >.<
{{item:3070}}
